Export.Routine: /** * This runs the procedures that read and write ASTM files. * ^READASTM: procedure that reads incoming "requests" ASTM files * ^WRITEASTM: procedure that writes the outgoing "results" ASTM files * * @example * OMG>J ^STARTCOM * * @author Ivan Quintero * * **/ STARTCOM // @constant time interval (in seconds) set timeout = "5" // execution of procedures // incoming do ^READHL7 // outgoing do ^WRITEHL7 // wait the established timeout before starting over hang timeout // start over DO STARTCOM QUIT
